card.name: Adarkar Wastes
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{T}: Add {W} or {U}. Adarkar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Astor, Bearer of Blades
card.text: When Astor, Bearer of Blades enters the battlefield, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may reveal an Equipment or Vehicle card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.Equipment you control have equip {1}.Vehicles you control have crew 1.

card.name: Caves of Koilos
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{T}: Add {W} or {B}. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Ertai Resurrected
card.text: FlashWhen Ertai Resurrected enters the battlefield, choose up to one —• Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. Its controller draws a card.• Destroy another target creature or planeswalker. Its controller draws a card.

card.name: Golden Argosy
card.text: Whenever Golden Argosy attacks, exile each creature that crewed it this turn. Return them to the battlefield tapped under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Ivy, Gleeful Spellthief
card.text: FlyingWhenever a player casts a spell that targets only a single creature other than Ivy, Gleeful Spellthief, you may copy that spell. The copy targets Ivy. (A copy of an Aura spell becomes a token.)

card.name: Jhoira, Ageless Innovator
card.text: {T}: Put two ingenuity counters on Jhoira, Ageless Innovator, then you may put an artifact card with mana value X or less from your hand onto the battlefield, where X is the number of ingenuity counters on Jhoira.

card.name: Jodah, the Unifier
card.text: Legendary creatures you control get +X/+X where X is the number of legendary creatures you control.Whenever you cast a legendary spell from your hand, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a legendary nonland card with lesser mana value. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Karn's Sylex
card.text: Karn's Sylex enters the battlefield tapped.Players can't pay life to cast spells or to activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.{X}, {T}, Exile Karn's Sylex: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X or less. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Karplusan Forest
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{T}: Add {R} or {G}. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: King Darien XLVIII
card.text: Other creatures you control get +1/+1.{3}{G}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on King Darien and create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.Sacrifice King Darien: Creature tokens you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Meria, Scholar of Antiquity
card.text: Tap an untapped nontoken artifact you control: Add {G}.Tap two untapped nontoken artifacts you control: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

card.name: Nemata, Primeval Warden
card.text: ReachIf a creature an opponent controls would die, exile it instead. When you do, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.{G}, Sacrifice a Saproling: Nemata, Primeval Warden gets +2/+2 until end of turn.{1}{B}, Sacrifice two Saprolings: Draw a card.

card.name: Plaza of Heroes
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a legendary spell.{T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary permanents you control.{3}, {T}, Exile Plaza of Heroes: Target legendary creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Ratadrabik of Urborg
card.text: Vigilance, ward {2}Other zombies you control have vigilance.Whenever another legendary creature you control dies, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's not legendary and it's a 2/2 black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

card.name: Rith, Liberated Primeval
card.text: Flying, ward {2}Other Dragons you control have ward {2}.At the beginning of your end step, if a creature or planeswalker an opponent controlled was dealt excess damage this turn, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

card.name: Rivaz of the Claw
card.text: Menace{T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon creature spells.Once during each of your turns, you may cast a Dragon creature spell from your graveyard.Whenever you cast a Dragon creature spell from your graveyard, it gains "When this creature dies, exile it."

card.name: Shanna, Purifying Blade
card.text: LifelinkAt the beginning of your end step, you may pay {X}. If you do, draw X cards. X can't be greater than the amount of life you gained this turn.

card.name: Shivan Reef
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Shivan Reef
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Sol'Kanar the Tainted
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, choose one that hasn't been chosen —• Draw a card.• Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.• Sol'Kanar the Tainted deals 3 damage to up to one other target creature or planeswalker.• Exile Sol'Kanar, then return it to the battlefield under an opponent's control.

card.name: Soul of Windgrace
card.text: Whenever Soul of Windgrace enters the battlefield or attacks, you may put a land card from a graveyard onto the battlefield tapped under your control.{G}, Discard a land card: You gain 3 life.{1}{R}, Discard a land card: Draw a card.{2}{B}, Discard a land card: Soul of Windgrace gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

card.name: Stenn, Paranoid Partisan
card.text: As Stenn, Paranoid Partisan enters the battlefield, choose a card type other than creature or land.Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.{1}{W}{U}: Exile Stenn. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Sulfurous Springs
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{T}: Add {B} or {R}. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Thran Portal
card.text: Thran Portal enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.As Thran Portal enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.Thran Portal is the chosen type in addition to its other types.Mana abilities of Thran Portal cost an additional 1 life to activate.

card.name: Thran Portal
card.text: Thran Portal enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.As Thran Portal enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.Thran Portal is the chosen type in addition to its other types.Mana abilities of Thran Portal cost an additional 1 life to activate.

card.name: Timeless Lotus
card.text: Timeless Lotus enters the battlefield tapped.{T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}.

card.name: Weatherlight Compleated
card.text: FlyingAs long as Weatherlight Compleated has four or more phyresis counters on it, it's a Phyrexian creature in addition to its other types.Whenever a creature you control dies, put a phyresis counter on Weatherlight Compleated. Then draw a card if it has seven or more phyresis counters on it. If it doesn't, scry 1.

card.name: Zur, Eternal Schemer
card.text: FlyingEnchantment creatures you control have deathtouch, lifelink, and hexproof.{1}{W}: Target non-Aura enchantment you control becomes a creature in addition to its other types and has base power and base toughness each equal to its mana value.
